column4: My windows is messed up, and it crashed the last time I could open it, so now I cant open up Ubuntu. Any help?
My Windows has major erros and it cannot boot. I cant run Ubuntu now either...any help?
My windows has major errors and it cannot boot. How can I run Ubuntu now?
You know the one it gives when windows crashed unexpectedly
How was ubuntu installed and please dont say wubi
You cant run ubuntu from ntfs
Ubuntu can read write ntfs or fat
Boot a livecd of ubuntu and save your files to usb drive
Can you mount the windows partition?
Then we are not going to be able to help you and you will need professional tools or assistance
Oh, you did not create a mount point either
I will show you how to properly mount that.. but if it wont mount we cant help
sudo mkdir /media/locked-drive          then                sudo mount -t ntfs-3g /dev/sda1 /media/locked-drive
What version of windows were you running?
XP.. the 2000 or XP will do
